prompt: <description>Part 1: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a tapered top and bottom Construct a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a tapered top and bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and a translation vector of [0.0, 0.15, 0.0]. Then, create the 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the coordinate system. Sketch a rectangle with the following four lines: * Line 1: Start Point [0.0, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.0] * Line 2: Start Point [0.75, 0.0], End Point [0.75, 0.75] * Line 3: Start Point [0.75, 0.75], End Point [0.0, 0.75] * Line 4: Start Point [0.0, 0.75], End Point [0.0, 0.0] Next, scale the 2D sketch using the scaling parameter of 0.75. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following parameters: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.0 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.375 * Sketch scale: 0.75 Part 2: Cylindrical object with a tapered top and a flat bottom Construct a cylindrical object with a tapered top and a flat bottom. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with euler angles of [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] and a translation vector of [0.3, 0.15, 0.3]. Then, create the 2D sketch on the X-Y plane of the coordinate system. Sketch a circle with the center point at [0.075, 0.075] and radius of 0.075. Next, scale the 2D sketch using the scaling parameter of 0.15. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch using the euler angles and translation vector defined in the coordinate system. Extrude the 2D sketch to generate the 3D model with the following parameters: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.15 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0 * Sketch scale: 0.15 The final shape is a three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole in the center. The prism has a flat base and a flat top, and the cylindrical hole is centered along the length of the prism. The prism is symmetrical along its central axis. * Shape: Three-dimensional rectangular prism with a cylindrical hole * Length: 0.6 * Width: 0.45 * Height: 0.375</description>
